segments.text: Oh my, look at that little boy trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that wobbly stool, reaching up as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit anxious watching him like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined, though, doesn't he?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember being that age, wanting something so badly and not caring about the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is waiting patiently for him to share some cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, standing there with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mother knows they're up to something behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to spoil their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a tough call, but I think I'll just sit back and watch what happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: After all, kids will be kids, and they seem to be having a great time.
segments.speaker: PAR
